title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Finding Roosevelt
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations     Finding Roosevelt                Finding Roosevelt                         Finding Roosevelt This video takes you on a journey over land and through time to discover why there is a national park named after Theodore Roosevelt. Designed for North Dakota school students to meet state curriculum standards.  Duration:15 minutes            Â    For closed captions on "Finding Roosevelt," please visit our YouTube site and watch the video there. For Teachers: After your class has watched the video, use our assessment activity to see what they learned! This will help your students make connections between the video content and the lessons you are teaching in the classroom.
